name: Time Vortex
desc: Normal damage and target vanishes, reappearing 1d4 rounds later

name: Maximum Effect
desc: Maximize all spell variables

name: Draining Spell
desc: Double damage and target randomly loses one spell or one use of a spell-like ability

name: Wild Surge
desc: Normal damage and normal damage of a random energy type

name: Excruciating
desc: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Terrifying Display
desc: Normal damage and target frightened for 1d4 rounds (Will negates)

name: Dispelling Aura
desc: Normal damage and dispel magic on the target

name: Concussive Spell
desc: Double damage and 1d4 bleed

name: Knockback
desc: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

name: I Love You, Man
desc: Normal damage and target is charmed for 3 rounds (Will negates)

name: Electrocuted
desc: Double damage. If electricity spell, target stunned for 1d4 rounds

name: Hypnotic Link
desc: Double damage and you may give the target 1 suggestion (as the spell. Will negates)

name: Frozen
desc: Double damage. If cold spell, target takes 1d4 Dex damage

name: Side Effect
desc: Double damage and you become invisible for 1d4 rounds

name: Turned Around
desc: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

name: Stunned
desc: Normal damage and target is stunned for 1 round

name: Call of the Wind
desc: Double damage or triple damage to animals, fey, magical beasts, and vermin

name: Petrified
desc: Normal damage and target is petrified for 1d4 hours (Fort negates)

name: Pretty Colors
desc: Double damage and target is dazzled for 1d4 rounds

name: Nerve Damage
desc: Normal damage and target is slow for 1d6 rounds

name: Arcane Blast
desc: Double damage and 2d6 random energy damage (Reflex half)

name: Planar Rift
desc: Normal damage and target sent to a random plane (Will negates)

name: Eyeburn
desc: Normal damage and target blinded for 1d4 rounds (Fort negates)

name: Intense Strike
desc: Double damage and ignore energy resistance (but not immunity)

name: Transposition
desc: Double damage and you and target switch places

name: Light Blast
desc: Double damage and target is blinded for 1 round

name: Conduit
desc: Double damage and target takes a -4 penalty on saves vs. your spells for 1d6 rounds

name: Lingering Magic
desc: Normal damage this round and half damage each round for 1d4 rounds

name: Allergic Reaction
desc: Double damage and 1d4 damage to a random ability score

name: Arcane Glow
desc: Double damage and target glows like faerie fire for 1d6 rounds

name: Combustion
desc: Double damage. If fire spell, target catches fire, taking 2d6 fire damage per round until extinguished

name: Unnatural Selection
desc: Double damage or triple damage to aberrations and outsiders

name: Corrosive
desc: Double damage. If acid spell, target takes 2d6 acid damage for 1d4 rounds

name: Funny Bone
desc: Double damage and target spends 1 round laughing (as hideous laughter spell, Will negates)

name: Phased
desc: Double damage and target is incorporeal for 1d3 rounds (Will negates)

name: Life Leech
desc: Normal damage and 1 negative level (Fort negates after 1 day)

name: Siren Song
desc: Double damage or triple damage to giants, humanoids and monstrous humanoids

name: Distraction
desc: Double damage and an illusion appears to attack foe, flanking him for you for 1d6 rounds

name: Arcane Goo
desc: Normal damage and target is entangled (DC 20 Str or Escape Artist to be freed)

name: Hoarder's Wrath
desc: Double damage or triple damage to dragons

name: Mind Cloud
desc: Double damage and target is dazed for 1 round

name: Elemental Call
desc: Normal damage. If elemental spell, Medium elemental appears to serve for 1d4 rounds

name: Splash Spell
desc: Normal damage and half damage to all adjacent targets

name: Olfactory Overload
desc: Double damage and target loses scent and blindsense for 1 day

name: Cut off from Magic
desc: Normal damage and target cannot cast spells or use spell-like abilities for 1d4 rounds

name: Aura of Protection
desc: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round

name: Vulnerability
desc: Double damage and if the spell did elemental damage the target is now vulnerable to that element for 3 rounds

name: Roaring Spell
desc: Double damage and target is deafened for 1d4 rounds

name: Returning Spell
desc: Double damage and spell is not lost

name: Power Surge
desc: Triple damage

name: Vampiric Magic
desc: Normal damage. You are healed the same amount

name: Shrink Ray
desc: Normal damage and target is reduced for 3 rounds (as Reduce person, Will negates)
